00040 string createResponse(string htm,string url)
00041 {
00042         string data;
00043         stringstream ss;
00044         ss << htm.length();
00045 
00046         string temp;
00047         ss >> temp;
00048         size_t tes;
00049         if((tes=url.find(".html"))!=string::npos)
00050         {
00051                 data = "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\nDate: Fri, 31 Dec 1999 23:59:59 GMT\nContent-Type: text/html\nContent-Length: "+temp+"\n\n"+htm+"\n";
00052                 //cout << "HTML DATA" <<flush;
00053         }
00054         else if(htm.size()!=0)
00055         {
00056                 data = "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\nDate: Fri, 31 Dec 1999 23:59:59 GMT\nContent-Type: image/jpeg\nContent-Length: "+temp+"\n\n"+htm+"\n";
00057                 //cout << "other DATA" <<flush;
00058         }
00059         return data;
00060 }
00061 
00062 string getFileExtension(const string& file)
00063 {
00064         string str = file;
00065         string ext = "";
00066         for(unsigned int i=0; i<str.length(); i++)
00067         {
00068                 if(str[i] == '.')
00069                 {
00070                         for(unsigned int j = i; j<str.length(); j++)
00071                         {
00072                                 ext += str[j];
00073                         }
00074                         return ext;
00075                 }
00076         }
00077         return ext;
00078 }

00119 string getContent(string url)
00120 {
00121         string all;
00122         string line;
00123         string fname = "/home/sumeet/"+url;
00124 
00125         if (url=="/")
00126         {
00127                 //cout << "\nURL is" << fname << flush;
00128                 return all;
00129         }
00130         //Magick::Image image("/home/sumeet/test123.jpg");
00131     ifstream myfile (&fname[0],ios::in | ios::binary);
00132     stringstream ss;
00133     if (myfile.is_open())
00134     {
00135           while (!myfile.eof())
00136           {
00137                   getline(myfile,line);
00138                   //char c = getchar(myfile);
00139                   //ss << c;
00140                   all += line;
00141           }
00142           myfile.close();
00143     }
00144     else
00145     {
00146         //cout << "Unable to open file";
00147     }
00148     //ss >> all;
00149     return all;
00150 }

00152 vector<unsigned char> getContentVec(string url,string locale,string ext)
00153 {
00154         vector<unsigned char> all;
00155         string fname = ""+url;
00156 
00157         if (url=="/")
00158         {
00159                 //cout << "\nURL is" << fname << flush;
00160                 return all;
00161         }
00162         ifstream myfile;
00163         //Magick::Image image("/home/sumeet/test123.jpg");
00164         if(locale.find("english")==string::npos && (ext==".html" || ext==".htm"))
00165         {
00166                 string fnj = fname;
00167                 boost::replace_first(fnj,".",("_" + locale+"."));
00168                 myfile.open(&fnj[0],ios::in | ios::binary);
00169                 cout << fnj << flush;
00170         }
00171         if(!myfile.is_open())
00172                 myfile.open(&fname[0],ios::in | ios::binary);
00173     unsigned char byte = '\0';
00174     if (myfile.is_open())
00175     {
00176       while (myfile.read((char*)&byte, sizeof(byte)))
00177           {
00178                   all.push_back(byte);
00179           }
00180           myfile.close();
00181     }
00182     else
00183     {
00184         //cout << "Unable to open file";
00185     }
00186     //ss >> all;
00187     return all;
00188 }
00189 
00190 string createResponse(HttpResponse res)
00191 {
00192         string resp;
00193         resp = (res.getHttpVersion() + " " + res.getStatusCode() + " " + res.getStatusMsg() + "\n");
00194         if(res.getContent().size()>0)
00195         {
00196                 resp += ("Content-Length: "+res.getContent_len() + "\n");
00197                 resp += ("Content-Type: "+res.getContent_type() + "\n\n");
00198         }
00199         else
00200                 resp += "\n";
00201         return resp;
00202 }

00204 void listi(string cwd,string type,bool apDir,strVec &folders)
00205 {
00206         FILE *pipe_fp;
00207         string command;
00208         command = ("ls -F1 "+cwd+"|grep '"+type+"$'");
00209         if ((pipe_fp = popen(command.c_str(), "r")) == NULL)
00210         {
00211                 printf("pipe open error in cmd_list\n");
00212         }
00213         char t_char;
00214         string folderName;
00215         while ((t_char = fgetc(pipe_fp)) != EOF)
00216         {
00217                 if(t_char!='\n')
00218                 {
00219                         stringstream ss;
00220                         ss << t_char;
00221                         string temp;
00222                         ss >> temp;
00223                         folderName.append(temp);
00224                 }
00225                 else if(folderName!="")
00226                 {
00227                         if(apDir)
00228                                 folders.push_back(cwd+folderName);
00229                         else
00230                                 folders.push_back(folderName);
00231                         folderName = "";
00232                 }
00233         }
00234         pclose(pipe_fp);
00235 }

00247         {
00248                 ss << buf;
00249                 memset(&buf[0], 0, sizeof(buf));
00250                 //cout << "\n" << bytes << flush;
00251                 bytes = -1;
00252         }
00253         /*while((bytes=recv(fd, buf, sizeof buf, 0))!=-1)
00254         {
00255                 ss << buf;
00256                 buf[0] = '\0';
00257         }*/

00259         {
00260                 results.push_back(temp);
00261         }
00262         string webpath = serverRootDirectory + "web/";
00263         HttpRequest* req= new HttpRequest(results,webpath);
00264         string sessId = (ip + req->getUser_agent());
00265         HttpSession sess = sessionMap[sessId];
00266         /*if(req->getCntxt_name()=="public" && pubMap[req->getFile()]=="true")
00267         {
00268                 req->setUrl(serverRootDirectory+req->getActUrl());
00269         }
00270         else */if(cntMap[req->getCntxt_name()]!="true")
00271         {
00272                 req->setCntxt_name("default");
00273                 req->setCntxt_root(webpath+"default");
00274                 req->setUrl(webpath+"default"+req->getActUrl());
00275         }
00276         if(appMap[req->getCntxt_name()]!="false")
00277         {
00278                 //void *dlib1 = dlopen("libinter.so", RTLD_NOW);
00279                 if(dlib == NULL)
00280                 {
00281                         cerr << dlerror() << endl;
00282                         exit(-1);
00283                 }
00284                 string meth1 = (req->getCntxt_name()+"checkRules");
00285                 string path1;
00286                 void *mkr1 = dlsym(dlib, meth1.c_str());
00287                 if(mkr1!=NULL)
00288                 {
00289                         typedef string (*DCPPtr1) (string,HttpSession);
00290                         DCPPtr1 f =  (DCPPtr1)mkr1;

00296                         }

00298                         {
00299                                 req->setUrl(path1);
00300                         }
00301                 }
00302         }
00303 
00304         HttpResponse res;
00305         res.setHttpVersion(req->getHttpVersion());
00306 
00307         if(sess.getSessionId()!="")
00308                 req->setSession(sess);
00309         else
00310         {
00311                 sess = req->getSession();
00312                 sess.setSessionId(sessId);
00313         }
00314         string treee = "sumeet";
00315         sess.setAttribute("USER",treee);

00321                 test = getContentVec(req->getUrl(),lprops[req->getDefaultLocale()],ext);

00324         cout << urlpattMap["*.*"] << flush;
00325         if(urlpattMap["*.*"]!="" || urlMap[ext]!="")
00326         {

00328                         claz = "getReflectionCIFor" + urlpattMap["*.*"];

00330                         claz = "getReflectionCIFor" + urlMap[ext];

00340                 {

00596         string h1;
00597         h1 = createResponse(res);

00599                 cout << "send failed" << flush;
00600

00602         if(res.getStatusCode()!="404" && res.getContent().size()>0)
00603         {
00604                 if ((size=send(fd,&(res.getContent())[0],res.getContent().size(),0)) == -1)
00605                         cout << "send failed" << flush;
00606         }
00607 
00608         memset(&buf[0], 0, sizeof(buf));
00609         close(fd);
00610 
00611         ss.clear();
00612         //boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);

00615         //ss >> h;
00616         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00617         //h = "\nRequest Number: " + h + ": " + res.getStatusCode();
00618         /*logfile << ("got new connection to process\n") << flush;
00619         logfile << (req->getFile()+" :: " + res.getStatusCode() + "\n") << flush;
00620         logfile << (req->getCntxt_name() + "\n") << flush;
00621         logfile << (req->getCntxt_root() + "\n") << flush;
00622         logfile << (req->getUrl() + "\n") << flush;*/
00623         logger->info("got new connection to process\n"+req->getFile()+" :: " + res.getStatusCode() + "\n"+req->getCntxt_name() + "\n"+req->getCntxt_root() + "\n"+req->getUrl());
00624         delete req;
00625         sessionMap[sessId] = sess;}catch(...){ cout << "Standard exception: " << endl;}
00626 }
00627 
00628 
00629 void sigchld_handler(int s)
00630 {
00631     while(waitpid(-1, NULL, WNOHANG) > 0);
00632 }
00633 
00634 // get sockaddr, IPv4 or IPv6:
00635 void *get_in_addr(struct sockaddr *sa)
00636 {
00637     if (sa->sa_family == AF_INET) {
00638         return &(((struct sockaddr_in*)sa)->sin_addr);
00639     }
00640 
00641     return &(((struct sockaddr_in6*)sa)->sin6_addr);
00642 }
00643 
00644 
00645 int send_connection(int fd,int unix_socket_fd)
00646 {
00647         //struct sockaddr_un unix_socket_name = {0};
00648         struct msghdr msg;
00649         char ccmsg[CMSG_SPACE(sizeof(int))];
00650         struct cmsghdr *cmsg;
00651         struct iovec vec;  /* stupidity: must send/receive at least one byte */
00652         char *str = (char *)"x";
00653         int rv;
00654 
00655         //msg.msg_name = (struct sockaddr*)&unix_socket_name;
00656         //msg.msg_namelen = sizeof(unix_socket_name);
00657         msg.msg_name = 0;
00658         msg.msg_namelen = 0;
00659         vec.iov_base = str;
00660         vec.iov_len = 1;
00661         msg.msg_iov = &vec;
00662         msg.msg_iovlen = 1;
00663 
00664         /* old BSD implementations should use msg_accrights instead of
00665         * msg_control; the interface is different. */
00666         msg.msg_control = ccmsg;
00667         msg.msg_controllen = sizeof(ccmsg);
00668         cmsg = CMSG_FIRSTHDR(&msg);
00669         cmsg->cmsg_level = SOL_SOCKET;
00670         cmsg->cmsg_type = SCM_RIGHTS;
00671         cmsg->cmsg_len = CMSG_LEN(sizeof(int));
00672         *(int*)CMSG_DATA(cmsg) = fd;
00673         msg.msg_controllen = cmsg->cmsg_len;
00674 
00675         msg.msg_flags = 0;
00676         //boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(p_mutex);
00677         if((rv= sendmsg(unix_socket_fd, &msg, 0)) < 0 )
00678         {
00679           perror("sendmsg()");
00680           exit(1);
00681         }
00682         close(fd);
00683         return rv;
00684 }
00685 
00686 int receive_fd(int fd)
00687 {
00688   struct msghdr msg;
00689   struct iovec iov;
00690   char buf[1];
00691   int rv;
00692   int connfd = -1;
00693   char ccmsg[CMSG_SPACE(sizeof(connfd))];
00694   struct cmsghdr *cmsg;
00695 
00696   iov.iov_base = buf;
00697   iov.iov_len = 1;
00698 
00699   msg.msg_name = 0;
00700   msg.msg_namelen = 0;
00701   msg.msg_iov = &iov;
00702   msg.msg_iovlen = 1;
00703   /* old BSD implementations should use msg_accrights instead of
00704    * msg_control; the interface is different. */
00705   msg.msg_control = ccmsg;
00706   msg.msg_controllen = sizeof(ccmsg); /* ? seems to work... */
00707 
00708   rv = recvmsg(fd, &msg, 0);
00709   if (rv == -1) {
00710     perror("recvmsg");
00711     return -1;
00712   }
00713 
00714   cmsg = CMSG_FIRSTHDR(&msg);
00715   if (!cmsg->cmsg_type == SCM_RIGHTS) {
00716     fprintf(stderr, "got control message of unknown type %d\n",
00717             cmsg->cmsg_type);
00718     return -1;
00719   }
00720   return *(int*)CMSG_DATA(cmsg);
00721 }
00722 string servd;
00723 void signalSIGSEGV(int dummy)
00724 {
00725         signal(SIGSEGV,signalSIGSEGV);
00726         string filename;
00727         stringstream ss;
00728         ss << servd;
00729         ss << getpid();
00730         ss >> filename;
00731         filename.append(".cntrl");
00732         remove(filename.c_str());
00733         void * array[25];
00734         int nSize = backtrace(array, 25);
00735         char ** symbols = backtrace_symbols(array, nSize);
00736         string tempo;
00737         for (int i = 0; i < nSize; i++)
00738         {
00739                 tempo = symbols[i];
00740                 tempo += "\n";
00741         }
00742         free(symbols);
00743         cout << "Segmentation fault occurred for process" << getpid() << "\n" << tempo << flush;
00744         abort();
00745 }
00746 
00747 void signalSIGFPE(int dummy)
00748 {
00749         signal(SIGFPE,signalSIGFPE);
00750         string filename;
00751         stringstream ss;
00752         ss << servd;
00753         ss << getpid();
00754         ss >> filename;
00755         filename.append(".cntrl");
00756         remove(filename.c_str());
00757         void * array[25];
00758         int nSize = backtrace(array, 25);
00759         char ** symbols = backtrace_symbols(array, nSize);
00760         string tempo;
00761         for (int i = 0; i < nSize; i++)
00762         {
00763                 tempo = symbols[i];
00764                 tempo += "\n";
00765         }
00766         free(symbols);
00767         cout << "Floating point Exception occurred for process" << getpid() << "\n" << tempo << flush;
00768         abort();
00769 }
00770 
00771 void cleanUpRoutine(string tempo)
00772 {
00773         cout << "Floating point Exception occurred for process" << getpid() << "\n" << tempo << flush;
00774         abort();
00775 }

00777 pid_t createChildProcess(string serverRootDirectory,int sp[],int sockfd)
00778 {
00779         pid_t pid;
00780         struct epoll_event ev;
00781         if (socketpair(AF_UNIX, SOCK_DGRAM, 0, sp) == -1)
00782         {
00783                 perror("socketpair");
00784                 exit(1);
00785         }
00786         if((pid=fork())==0)
00787         {
00788                 if(dlib==NULL)
00789                 {
00790                         dlib = dlopen("libinter.so", RTLD_NOW|RTLD_GLOBAL);
00791                         if(dlib==NULL)
00792                         {
00793                                 cout << dlerror() << endl;
00794                                 logger->info("Could not load Library");
00795                         }
00796                         else
00797                                 logger->info("Library loaded successfully");
00798                 }
00799                 servd = serverRootDirectory;
00800                 string filename;
00801                 stringstream ss;
00802                 ss << serverRootDirectory;
00803                 ss << getpid();
00804                 ss >> filename;
00805                 filename.append(".cntrl");
00806                 cout << "generated file " << filename << flush;
00807                 ofstream cntrlfile;
00808                 cntrlfile.open(filename.c_str());
00809                 cntrlfile << "Process Running" << flush;
00810                 cntrlfile.close();
00811                 struct msghdr msg;
00812                 struct iovec iov;
00813                 char buf[1];
00814                 int rv;
00815                 int connfd = -1;
00816                 char ccmsg[CMSG_SPACE(sizeof(connfd))];
00817                 struct cmsghdr *cmsg;
00818 
00819                 iov.iov_base = buf;
00820                 iov.iov_len = 1;
00821 
00822                 msg.msg_name = 0;
00823                 msg.msg_namelen = 0;
00824                 msg.msg_iov = &iov;
00825                 msg.msg_iovlen = 1;
00826                 /* old BSD implementations should use msg_accrights instead of
00827                 * msg_control; the interface is different. */
00828                 msg.msg_control = ccmsg;
00829                 msg.msg_controllen = sizeof(ccmsg); /* ? seems to work... */
00830                 close(sockfd);
00831                 struct epoll_event events[1];
00832                 //printf("parent side--%d child side---%d child pid--%ld\n",sp[j][0],sp[j][1],(long)getpid());
00833                 int epoll_handle = epoll_create(1);
00834                 ev.events = EPOLLIN | EPOLLPRI;
00835                 ev.data.fd = sp[1];
00836                 if (epoll_ctl(epoll_handle, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, sp[1], &ev) < 0)
00837                 {
00838                         fprintf(stderr, "epoll set insertion error: fd=%d\n", sp[1]);
00839                         return -1;
00840                 }
00841                 while(1)
00842                 {
00843                         int nfds = epoll_wait(epoll_handle, events, 1,-1);
00844                         if (nfds == -1)
00845                         {
00846                                 perror("epoll_wait child process");
00847                                 //break;
00848                         }
00849                         else
00850                         {
00851                                 //int fd = receive_fd(sp[j][1]);
00852                                 rv = recvmsg(sp[1], &msg, 0);
00853                                 if (rv == -1)
00854                                 {
00855                                         perror("recvmsg");
00856                                         exit(1);
00857                                 }
00858 
00859                                 cmsg = CMSG_FIRSTHDR(&msg);
00860                                 if (!cmsg->cmsg_type == SCM_RIGHTS)
00861                                 {
00862                                         fprintf(stderr, "got control message of unknown type %d\n",cmsg->cmsg_type);
00863                                         exit(1);
00864                                 }
00865                                 int fd = *(int*)CMSG_DATA(cmsg);
00866                                 fcntl(fd, F_SETFL,O_SYNC);
00867                                 //printf("child: read %d for %d child pid--%ld\n", fd,events[nfds].data.fd,(long)getpid());
00868                                 string jh;
00869 
00870                                 boost::thread m_thread(boost::bind(&service,fd,serverRootDirectory,jh));
00871                                 //cout << "child got connection\n" << flush;
00872                                 //close(fd);
00873                                 //m_thread.join();
00874                         }
00875                 }
00876         }
00877         return pid;
00878 }
00879 
00880 pid_t createChildMonitProcess(int sp[])
00881 {
00882         pid_t pid;
00883         if (socketpair(AF_UNIX, SOCK_DGRAM, 0, sp) == -1)
00884         {
00885                 perror("socketpair");
00886                 exit(1);
00887         }
00888         if((pid=fork())==0)
00889         {
00890                 map<string,bool> stat;
00891                 while(1)
00892                 {
00893                         char buf[10];
00894                         if(read(sp[1], buf, sizeof buf) < 0)
00895                         {
00896                                 string temp = buf;
00897                                 strVec tempv;
00898                                 boost::iter_split(tempv, temp, boost::first_finder(":"));
00899                                 if(tempv.size()==2)
00900                                 {
00901                                         if(tempv.at(0)=="R")
00902                                         {
00903                                                 string h = "0";
00904                                                 if(stat[tempv.at(1)])
00905                                                         h = "1";
00906                                                 write(sp[0], h.c_str() , sizeof(h));
00907                                         }
00908                                         else if(tempv.at(0)=="W")
00909                                         {
00910                                                 stat[tempv.at(1)] = false;
00911                                         }
00912                                 }
00913                         }
00914                 }
00915         }
00916         return pid;
00917 }
00918 
00919 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00920 {
00921         signal(SIGSEGV,signalSIGSEGV);
00922         signal(SIGFPE,signalSIGFPE);
00923         //std::cout << argv[0] << std::endl;
00924         int sockfd, new_fd;  // listen on sock_fd, new connection on new_fd
00925     struct addrinfo hints, *servinfo, *p;
00926     struct sockaddr_storage their_addr; // connector's address information
00927     socklen_t sin_size;
00928     struct sigaction sa;
00929 
00930 
00931     struct epoll_event ev;
00932         //struct rlimit rt;
00933     int yes=1;
00934     //char s[INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
00935     int rv,nfds,preForked=5;
00936 
00937     /*char path[1024];
00938         pwd(path,sizeof path);
00939         string serverRootDirectory;
00940         stringstream sf;
00941         sf << path;
00942         sf >> serverRootDirectory;*/
00943     string serverRootDirectory = argv[1];
00944 
00945         serverRootDirectory += "/";//serverRootDirectory = "/home/sumeet/server/";
00946         string incpath = serverRootDirectory + "include/";
00947         string rtdcfpath = serverRootDirectory + "rtdcf/";
00948         string pubpath = serverRootDirectory + "public/";
00949         string respath = serverRootDirectory + "resources/";
00950         string webpath = serverRootDirectory + "web/";
00951         resourcePath = respath;
00952 
00953         //string logf = serverRootDirectory+"/server.log";
00954         //logfile.open(logf.c_str());
00955         string logp = respath+"/log.prop";
00956         logger = new Logger(logp);
00957 
00958     PropFileReader pread;
00959     propMap srprps = pread.getProperties(respath+"server.prop");
00960     if(srprps["NUM_PROC"]!="")
00961         preForked = boost::lexical_cast<int>(srprps["NUM_PROC"]);
00962 
00963     /* Set each process to allow the maximum number of files to open */
00964         /*rt.rlim_max = rt.rlim_cur = MAXEPOLLSIZE;
00965         if(setrlimit(RLIMIT_NOFILE, &rt) == -1)
00966         {
00967                 perror("setrlimit");
00968                 exit(1);
00969         }
00970         else
00971                 printf("set the parameters of system resources, the success!\n");*/
00972 
00973     memset(&hints, 0, sizeof hints);
00974     hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00975     hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00976     hints.ai_flags = AI_PASSIVE; // use my IP
00977     string PORT = srprps["PORT_NO"];
00978     if ((rv = getaddrinfo(NULL, &PORT[0], &hints, &servinfo)) != 0) {
00979         fprintf(stderr, "getaddrinfo: %s\n", gai_strerror(rv));
00980         return 1;
00981     }
00982 
00983     // loop through all the results and bind to the first we can
00984     for(p = servinfo; p != NULL; p = p->ai_next) {
00985         if ((sockfd = socket(p->ai_family, p->ai_socktype,
00986                 p->ai_protocol)) == -1) {
00987             perror("server: socket");
00988             continue;
00989         }
00990         if (setsockopt(sockfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &yes,
00991                 sizeof(int)) == -1) {
00992             perror("setsockopt");
00993             exit(1);
00994         }
00995         if (bind(sockfd, p->ai_addr, p->ai_addrlen) == -1) {
00996                         close(sockfd);
00997             perror("server: bind");
00998             continue;
00999         }
01000         break;
01001     }
01002 
01003     if (p == NULL)  {
01004         fprintf(stderr, "server: failed to bind\n");
01005         return 2;
01006     }
01007     freeaddrinfo(servinfo); // all done with this structure
01008     if (listen(sockfd, BACKLOGM) == -1) {
01009         perror("listen");
01010         exit(1);
01011     }
01012     fcntl(sockfd, F_SETFL, fcntl(sockfd, F_GETFD, 0) | O_NONBLOCK);
01013     sa.sa_handler = sigchld_handler; // reap all dead processes
01014     sigemptyset(&sa.sa_mask);
01015     sa.sa_flags = SA_RESTART;
01016     if (sigaction(SIGCHLD, &sa, NULL) == -1) {
01017         perror("sigaction");
01018         exit(1);
01019     }
01020     strVec webdirs,webdirs1,pubfiles;
01021     listi(webpath,"/",true,webdirs);
01022     listi(webpath,"/",false,webdirs1);
01023     listi(pubpath,".js",false,pubfiles);
01024     for(unsigned int var=0;var<pubfiles.size();var++)
01025     {
01026         pubMap[pubfiles.at(var)] = "true";
01027     }
01028     strVec all,dcps,afcd,appf,wspath,compnts,cmpnames;
01029     string includeRef;
01030     TemplateEngine templ;
01031         Context cntxt;
01032         string libs,ilibs,isrcs,iobjs,ideps;
01033         Reflection ref;
01034         vector<string> vecvec;
01035         vector<bool> stat;
01036         propMap srp;
01037 
01038         XmlParser parser("Parser");
01039         ComponentGen gen;
01040 
01041     for(unsigned int var=0;var<webdirs.size();var++)
01042     {
01043         //cout <<  webdirs.at(0) << flush;
01044                 string defpath = webdirs.at(var);
01045                 string dcppath = defpath + "dcp/";
01046                 string cmppath = defpath + "components/";
01047                 string usrincludes = defpath + "include/";
01048                 //propMap srp = pread.getProperties(defpath+"config/app.prop");
01049 
01050                 string name = webdirs1.at(var);
01051                 boost::replace_all(name,"/","");
01052                 cntMap[name] = "true";
01053                 listi(dcppath,".dcp",true,dcps);
01054                 listi(cmppath,".cmp",true,compnts);
01055                 all.push_back(usrincludes);
01056                 appf.push_back(defpath+"app.xml");
01057 
01058                 libs += ("-l"+ name+" ");
01059                 ilibs += ("-I" + usrincludes+" ");
01060                 wspath.push_back(defpath);
01061 
01062                 Element root = parser.getDocument(defpath+"config/application.xml").getRootElement();
01063                 if(root.getTagName()=="app" && root.getChildElements().size()>0)
01064                 {
01065                         ElementList eles = root.getChildElements();
01066                         for (unsigned int apps = 0; apps < eles.size(); apps++)
01067                         {
01068                                 if(eles.at(apps).getTagName()=="controllers")
01069                                 {
01070                                         ElementList cntrls = eles.at(apps).getChildElements();
01071                                         for (unsigned int cntn = 0; cntn < cntrls.size(); cntn++)
01072                                         {
01073                                                 if(cntrls.at(cntn).getTagName()=="controller")
01074                                                 {
01075                                                         string url = cntrls.at(cntn).getAttribute("url");
01076                                                         if(cntrls.at(cntn).getAttribute("url").find("*")!=string::npos)
01077                                                         {

01080                                                                 else
01081                                                                 {
01082                                                                         url = url.substr(url.find("*")+1);
01083                                                                         urlMap[url] = cntrls.at(cntn).getAttribute("class");
01084                                                                 }
01085                                                         }
01086                                                         else
01087                                                                 urlMap[url] = cntrls.at(cntn).getAttribute("class");
01088                                                         //cout << url << " :: " << cntrls.at(cntn).getAttribute("class") << flush;
01089                                                 }

01091                                 }

01093                                 {
01094                                         ElementList tmplts = eles.at(apps).getChildElements();
01095                                         for (unsigned int tmpn = 0; tmpn < tmplts.size(); tmpn++)
01096                                         {

01098                                                 {

01100                                                         //cout << tmplts.at(tmpn).getAttribute("file") << " :: " << tmplts.at(tmpn).getAttribute("class") << flush;
01101                                                 }
01102                                         }
01103                                 }
01104                                 else if(eles.at(apps).getTagName()=="dviews")
01105                                 {
01106                                         ElementList dvs = eles.at(apps).getChildElements();
01107                                         for (unsigned int dn = 0; dn < dvs.size(); dn++)
01108                                         {
01109                                                 if(dvs.at(dn).getTagName()=="dview")
01110                                                 {
01111                                                         vwMap[dvs.at(dn).getAttribute("path")] = dvs.at(dn).getAttribute("class");
01112                                                         //cout << dvs.at(dn).getAttribute("path") << " :: " << dvs.at(dn).getAttribute("class") << flush;
01113                                                 }
01114                                         }
01115                                 }
01116                         }
01117                 }
01118                 Mapping* mapping = new Mapping;
01119                 smstrMap appTableColMapping;
01120                 strMap maptc,maptcl;
01121                 relMap appTableRelMapping;

01123                 if(dbroot.getTagName()=="cibernate")
01124                 {
01125                         ElementList dbeles = dbroot.getChildElements();
01126                         for (unsigned int dbs = 0; dbs < dbeles.size(); dbs++)
01127                         {
01128                                 if(dbeles.at(dbs).getTagName()=="config")
01129                                 {

01131                                         string uid,pwd,dsn;

01138                                                 }

01176                                                         {

01185                                                                 }

01187                                                                 {
01188                                                                         DBRel relation;

01350         struct epoll_event events[MAXEPOLLSIZE];
01351         int epoll_handle = epoll_create(MAXEPOLLSIZE);
01352         ev.events = EPOLLIN | EPOLLPRI;
01353         ev.data.fd = sockfd;
01354         if (epoll_ctl(epoll_handle, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, sockfd, &ev) < 0)
01355         {
01356                 fprintf(stderr, "epoll set insertion error: fd=%d\n", sockfd);
01357                 return -1;
01358         }
01359         else
01360                 printf("listener socket to join epoll success!\n");

01368         struct msghdr msg;
01369         char ccmsg[CMSG_SPACE(sizeof(int))];
01370         struct cmsghdr *cmsg;
01371         struct iovec vec;  /* stupidity: must send/receive at least one byte */
01372         char *str = (char *)"x";
01373         //msg.msg_name = (struct sockaddr*)&unix_socket_name;
01374         //msg.msg_namelen = sizeof(unix_socket_name);
01375         msg.msg_name = 0;
01376         msg.msg_namelen = 0;
01377         vec.iov_base = str;
01378         vec.iov_len = 1;
01379         msg.msg_iov = &vec;
01380         msg.msg_iovlen = 1;
01381 
01382         /* old BSD implementations should use msg_accrights instead of
01383         * msg_control; the interface is different. */
01384         msg.msg_control = ccmsg;
01385         msg.msg_controllen = sizeof(ccmsg);
01386         cmsg = CMSG_FIRSTHDR(&msg);
01387         cmsg->cmsg_level = SOL_SOCKET;
01388         cmsg->cmsg_type = SCM_RIGHTS;
01389         cmsg->cmsg_len = CMSG_LEN(sizeof(int));

01391         int curfds = 1;
01392         ifstream cntrlfile;

01394         while(1)
01395         {
01396 
01397                 if(childNo>=preForked)
01398                         childNo = 0;
01399                 nfds = epoll_wait(epoll_handle, events, curfds,-1);
01400                 if (nfds == -1)
01401                 {
01402                         perror("epoll_wait main process");
01403                         //logfile << "Interruption Signal Received\n" << flush;
01404                         logger->info("Interruption Signal Received\n");
01405                         //break;
01406                 }
01407                 for(int n=0;n<nfds;n++)
01408                 {
01409                         if(childNo>=preForked)
01410                                 childNo = 0;
01411                         if (events[n].data.fd == sockfd)
01412                         {
01413                                 new_fd = -1;
01414                                 sin_size = sizeof their_addr;
01415                                 new_fd = accept(sockfd, (struct sockaddr *)&their_addr, &sin_size);
01416                                 printf("new http request\n");
01417                                 //logfile << "Interruption Signal Received\n" << flush;
01418                                 if (new_fd == -1)
01419                                 {
01420                                         perror("accept");
01421                                         continue;
01422                                 }
01423                                 else
01424                                 {
01425                                         curfds++;
01426                                         fcntl(new_fd, F_SETFL, fcntl(new_fd, F_GETFD, 0) | O_NONBLOCK);
01427                                         ev.events = EPOLLIN | EPOLLPRI;
01428                                         ev.data.fd = new_fd;
01429                                         if (epoll_ctl(epoll_handle, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, new_fd, &ev) < 0)
01430                                         {
01431                                                 perror("epoll");
01432                                                 return -1;
01433                                         }
01434                                 }
01435                         }
01436                         else
01437                         {
01438                                 epoll_ctl(epoll_handle, EPOLL_CTL_DEL, events[n].data.fd,&ev);
01439                                 curfds--;
01440                                 //send_connection(events[n].data.fd,sp[childNo++][0]);

01442                                 cntrlfile.open(files.at(childNo).c_str());

01445                                         *(int*)CMSG_DATA(cmsg) = events[n].data.fd;
01446                                         msg.msg_controllen = cmsg->cmsg_len;
01447                                         if((rv= sendmsg(sp[childNo][0], &msg, 0)) < 0)
01448                                         {
01449                                           perror("sendmsg()");
01450                                           exit(1);
01451                                         }

01453                                         //logfile << ("sent socket to process "+cno+"\n") << flush;
01454                                         close(events[n].data.fd);
01455                                         childNo++;

01457                                         //m_thread.join();

01476                                                         close(events[n].data.fd);
01477                                                         childNo = o+1;
01478                                                         break;
01479                                                 }
01480                                         }
01481                                         close(sp[tcn][0]);
01482                                         close(sp[tcn][1]);
01483                                         cout << "Process got killed" << flush;
